definitions.body: :Is 11:6 wolf (NH id., Ar. d-iy’bun (jackal according to Hom:NS 303 ff.; but see RS:ZMG 1880, 373 and Doughty:Arab. Deseria i. 327; ii. 144, 145) Aram. [[דֵּיבָה]], di0bo0 As. zîbu Dl:S 47; Eth. z0b: hyena Di:1056 (on format. cf. Lag:BN 58); Ph. in cpd.n.pr. [[זיבקם]])—[[זְאֵב]] abs. Ge 49:27 + 2 t.; cstr. Je 5:6; pl. [[זְאֵבִים]] Ez Eze 22:27; cstr. [[זְאֵבֵי]] Hb Hab 1:8, Zep 3:3; —wolf, never in narrative; in predictions of peace in Messian. age [[וְגׇר זְאֵב עִם כֶּבֶשׂ]] Is 11:6 [[זְאֵב וְטָלֶה יִרְעוּ כְּאֶחָד]] Is 65:25; in simile, of Benjamin's fierceness [[זְאֵב יִטְרָָף]] ´[[ב]] Ge 49:27; of fierce horses of Chaldeans [[חַדּוּ מִזְּאֵבֵי עֶרֶב]] Hb Hab 1:8 (‖[[קַלּוּ מִנְּמֵרִים]]); of princes of Judah [[כִּזְאֵבִים]] [[טׂרְפֵי טָָרֶף]] Ez Eze 22:27; metaph. of enemies of Judah Je 5:6 [[זְאֵב עֲרָבוֹת]] (‖[[אַרְיֵה]], [[נׇמֵר]]); of corrupt and oppressive judges [[שׁׂפְטֶיהָ זְאֵבֵי עֶרֶב]] Zep 3:3 (‖[[אֲרָיוֹת שׁׂאֲגִים]]).
